1.text: ‘And in the seventh month, in the first of the month, a holy convocation ye have, ye do no servile work; a day of shouting it is to you;

2.text: and ye have prepared a burnt-offering, for sweet fragrance to Jehovah: one bullock, a son of the herd, one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

3.text: and their present, flour mixed with oil, three-tenth deals for the bullock, two-tenth deals for the ram,

4.text: and one-tenth deal for the one lamb, for the seven lambs;

5.text: and one kid of the goats, a sin-offering, to make atonement for you;

6.text: apart from the burnt-offering of the month, and its present, and the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and their libations, according to their ordinance, for sweet fragrance, a fire-offering to Jehovah.

7.text: ‘And on the tenth of this seventh month a holy convocation ye have, and ye have humbled your souls; ye do no work;

8.text: and ye have brought near a burnt-offering to Jehovah, a sweet fragrance, one bullock, a son of the herd, one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones they are for you,

9.text: and their present, flour mixed with oil, three-tenth deals for the bullock, two-tenth deals for the one ram,

10.text: a several tenth deal for the one lamb, for the seven lambs,

11.text: one kid of the goats, a sin-offering; apart from the sin-offering of the atonements, and the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and their libations.

12.text: ‘And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month a holy convocation ye have; ye do no servile work; and ye have celebrated a festival to Jehovah seven days,

13.text: and have brought near a burnt-offering, a fire-offering, a sweet fragrance, to Jehovah; thirteen bullocks, sons of the herd, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year; perfect ones they are;

14.text: and their present, flour mixed with oil, three-tenth deals to the one bullock, for the thirteen bullocks, two-tenth deals to the one ram, for the two rams,

15.text: and a several tenth deal to the one lamb, for the fourteen lambs,

16.text: and one kid of the goats, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, its present, and its libation.

17.text: ‘And on the second day twelve bullocks, sons of the herd, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

18.text: and their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the sheep, in their number, according to the ordinance;

19.text: and one kid of the goats, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and their libations.

20.text: ‘And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

21.text: and their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

22.text: and one goat, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and its libation.

23.text: ‘And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

24.text: their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

25.text: and one kid of the goats, a sin-offering, apart from the continual burnt-offering, its present, and its libation.

26.text: ‘And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

27.text: and their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

28.text: and one goat, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and its libation.

29.text: ‘And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

30.text: and their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

31.text: and one goat, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, its present, and its libation.

32.text: ‘And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

33.text: and their present, and their libations, for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

34.text: and one goat, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, its present, and its libation.

35.text: ‘On the eighth day a restraint ye have, ye do no servile work;

36.text: and ye have brought near a burnt-offering, a fire-offering, a sweet fragrance, to Jehovah; one bullock, one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

37.text: their present, and their libations, for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, in their number, according to the ordinance;

38.text: and one goat, a sin-offering; apart from the continual burnt-offering, and its present, and its libation.

39.text: ‘These ye prepare to Jehovah in your appointed seasons, apart from your vows, and your free-will offerings, for your burnt-offerings, and for your presents, and for your libations, and for your peace-offerings.’

40.text: And Moses saith unto the sons of Israel according to all that Jehovah hath commanded Moses.
